EmailTemplate.name: Case: All Work Orders have been Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: The Work Orders on your Case {!Case.Link} for {!Case.Account} have been approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OwnerFullName},
All associated Work Orders on your Case {!Case.Link} for {!Case.Account} have been approved.
Please close this case as Closed - Approved.
Kind regards, Salesforce Team
